title: F1 drivers who raced on weekends off — as Max Verstappen joins exclusive group
summary: Only a few modern F1 drivers have raced outside the championship mid-season. As Max Verstappen prepares to race at the Nürburgring, here's how his predecessors did

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is noted for joining an exclusive group of F1 drivers who raced outside the championship mid-season?
What notable circuit is mentioned in relation to Max Verstappen's participation outside of F1's championship?
How common is it for F1 drivers to race on weekends that are not part of the championship season?
